Key Match Events: Tanner Bibee gave up a two-run homer in the third and a solo shot in the fourth
Post-Match Reflections: Stephen Vogt said, 'They know how to pitch, and they've kept us off balance.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Steven Kwan was scratched from the lineup due to back soreness
Others: The Guardians' AL Central lead shrinks with the 2nd straight loss to the Rays
